data.event: Salisbury was chartered on November 3, 1761 as one of the New Hampshire Grants issued by Benning Wentworth.

event.title: operated as a farm and then a summer

data.event: The park originally operated as a farm and then a summer boys' camp before being named a state park in 1945.
The park originally operated as a farm and then a summer boys' camp before being named a state park in 1945.
